Title: M. De Marco
Body: Date: Thursday, 21-Nov-96 23:46:37 GMT Server: NCSA/1.1 MIME-version: 1.0 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Tuesday, 12-Nov-96 19:03:02 GMT M. De Marco M. De Marco To talk at a distance, when you have nothing to say, though you were ever so near; to go fast from this place to that, with nothing to do either at one or the other:  these are powers certainly.
